thread.title: ‘Novichok’: The chemical weapon used on Sergei Skripal

title: ‘Novichok’: The chemical weapon used on Sergei Skripal
text:
‘Novichok’: The chemical weapon used on Sergei Skripal Tuesday, March 13, 2018 - 01:53 
The British government contends that the poison used on former spy Sergei Skripal was an obscure nerve agent called ''Novichok.'' It's one of the deadliest chemical weapons ever developed, rooted in a secretive Cold War program from Russia. Anthony Deutsche explains.
